washi 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

washi

Inspired by other branding R packages such as glitr, ratlas, and nmfspalette, washi provides color palettes and themes consistent with Washington Soil Health Initiative (WaSHI) branding.

Installation

You can install the development version of washi from GitHub with:

# install.packages("devtools")
# devtools::install_github("WA-Department-of-Agriculture/washi")
library(washi)

Palettes

To list the names of all available palettes, call names(palettes_washi). To view a palette, use the palette_view() function.

All WaSHI standard colors 
palette_view("standard")

WaSHI colors adjusted to be color-blind safe 
palette_view("color_blind")

Color gradients

Available in green, blue, red, and gold.

palette_view("green_gradient")
